actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 to permit State and county extension services to obtain excess property from the United States.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 to permit State and county agricultural extension services to obtain excess personal property from the Secretary of Agriculture.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 to permit State and county extension services to obtain excess property from the United States.
